name: Notifyr Firmware
body:
NotifyrFirmware
===============
This repository is the home for Notifyr's awesome firmware. Running on a STM32L152 microcontroller, it processes commands sent over a BLE radio, and displays incoming notifications on a Sharp Memory LCD display.

To Modify and stuff, open in [CoIDE][1], you'll need the STLink drivers to program the board, and [ARM-GCC][2] to compile.

[1]:http://www.coocox.org/CooCox_CoIDE.htm
[2]:http://www.coocox.org/CoIDE/Compiler_Settings.html
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
